title: Balanced Life and Acupuncture: Acupunctura, Hierbas, Consultaciones de Salud Natural en Ann Arbor & Ypsilanti
description: Balanced Life and Acupuncture: la mejor acupunctura, hierbas, consultaciones en Ypsilanti y Ann Arbor

"Leila is so great at integrating different forms of healing in her sessions. She leaves one feeling healed and energized. Each session is carefully tailored to the needs of her patients. She goes the extra mile to really understand patient needs and always respects personal beliefs patients may have when working with them. I would highly recommend working with her!"--G.K.
|
|
|
|
Leila Plummer, R.Ac. (MI), Lic.Ac. (TX), Dipl.O.M., MAcOM, CCH es una Acupunturista Registrada y Yerbera Certificada, que practica la medicina natural, y es certificada por el consejo de NCCAOM en acupunctura, yerbas, y biomedicina. Ella ayuda a sus clientes de descrubir el raiz de dolor y otros problemas complejos de salud, y ayuda de fascilitar su salud.
